import { useState } from 'react'; import { Dialog } from '@headlessui/react'; import { XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; export default function PaymentForm({ invoice, onClose, onSubmit }) { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(''); const remainingAmount = invoice.total_amount - invoice.paid_amount; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSubmit(invoice.id, parseFloat(amount)); }; return (
Record Payment
₹{invoice.total_amount.toFixed(2)}
₹{invoice.paid_amount.toFixed(2)}
₹{remainingAmount.toFixed(2)}
setAmount(e.target.value)} max={remainingAmount} step="0.01" required className="mt-1 block w-full shadow-sm sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md" />
); }
